title: Is Trump’s viral dance a hit or a miss? Internet reacts to his Moms for Liberty performance, watch video
content: Donald Trump’s dance performance at the Moms for Liberty event in Washington DC captured significant online attention. While his political remarks were anticipated, his impromptu dance with co-founder Tiffany Justice went viral. Trump supporters praised his high energy, whereas critics labeled it as embarrassing. The event highlighted a mix of admiration and skepticism on social media.
summary: Donald Trump’s dance performance at the Moms for Liberty event in Washington DC captured significant online attention. While his political remarks were anticipated, his impromptu dance with co-founder Tiffany Justice went viral. Trump supporters praised his high energy, whereas critics labeled it as embarrassing. The event highlighted a mix of admiration and skepticism on social media.

title: Clooney hails Biden's decision to exit 2024 race: 'His withdrawal a selfless act echoing George Washington'
content: George Clooney has lauded President Joe Biden's decision to withdraw from the 2024 presidential race, calling it a selfless act. Clooney's New York Times op-ed noted the impact of age on Biden's abilities and supported a new nominee. Biden cited pressures from party elites as a major factor in his decision.
summary: George Clooney has lauded President Joe Biden's decision to withdraw from the 2024 presidential race, calling it a selfless act. Clooney's New York Times op-ed noted the impact of age on Biden's abilities and supported a new nominee. Biden cited pressures from party elites as a major factor in his decision.

title: 'Huge number of ballistic missiles' hit Ukraine, Kyiv forces down dozens of Russian drones: Key details
content: Kyiv endured a significant missile attack early Monday, marking Russia’s third major offensive on Ukraine in a week. A mix of missiles and drones were used, with Ukrainian air defenses intercepting many. Despite the assault, schools in Kyiv remain operational, equipped with bomb shelters for protection following regulations implemented since Russia's 2022 invasion.
summary: Kyiv endured a significant missile attack early Monday, marking Russia’s third major offensive on Ukraine in a week. A mix of missiles and drones were used, with Ukrainian air defenses intercepting many. Despite the assault, schools in Kyiv remain operational, equipped with bomb shelters for protection following regulations implemented since Russia's 2022 invasion.

title: Fridgescaping takes over social media: Why people are transforming their fridges into works of art
content: Fridgescaping, gaining popularity on social media, involves decorating refrigerator interiors with ornate items like picture frames and flowers. Initially focused on neat organization, it now turns fridges into stylish showcases. This trend enhances food visibility, reduces waste, and boosts meal creativity, while maintaining cleanliness. Not everyone agrees, but it has practical benefits.
summary: Fridgescaping, gaining popularity on social media, involves decorating refrigerator interiors with ornate items like picture frames and flowers. Initially focused on neat organization, it now turns fridges into stylish showcases. This trend enhances food visibility, reduces waste, and boosts meal creativity, while maintaining cleanliness. Not everyone agrees, but it has practical benefits.

title: Australian ex-childcare worker Ashley Paul Griffith pleads guilty to sexual abuse of some 60 girls
content: Ashley Paul Griffith, a former childcare worker, pleaded guilty to raping, sexually abusing, and exploiting dozens of girls in Australia and Italy between 2003 and 2022. Facing 307 charges concerning around 60 children, Griffith's sentencing is expected to take more than two days due to the inclusion of victim impact statements.
summary: Ashley Paul Griffith, a former childcare worker, pleaded guilty to raping, sexually abusing, and exploiting dozens of girls in Australia and Italy between 2003 and 2022. Facing 307 charges concerning around 60 children, Griffith's sentencing is expected to take more than two days due to the inclusion of victim impact statements.

title: Royal rift? How Prince William and Princess Kate's choices could disappoint King Charles
content: Prince William and Princess Kate are considering changing a long-standing royal tradition, which could cause concern for King Charles. They are encouraged to establish a home in Wales to build a stronger connection with its people, following King Charles's example. Their decision could impact their future roles, balancing tradition and modernity.
summary: Prince William and Princess Kate are considering changing a long-standing royal tradition, which could cause concern for King Charles. They are encouraged to establish a home in Wales to build a stronger connection with its people, following King Charles's example. Their decision could impact their future roles, balancing tradition and modernity.

title: SpaceX rocket explosion rips hole in earth's upper atmosphere: Study
content: A study by Russian scientists reveals that an explosion of a SpaceX Starship rocket on November 18, 2023, caused a temporary hole in the Earth's ionosphere—an unprecedented phenomenon for a human-made explosion. The incident underscores the profound environmental impacts of space exploration gone awry, urging a closer look at technological advancements.
summary: A study by Russian scientists reveals that an explosion of a SpaceX Starship rocket on November 18, 2023, caused a temporary hole in the Earth's ionosphere—an unprecedented phenomenon for a human-made explosion. The incident underscores the profound environmental impacts of space exploration gone awry, urging a closer look at technological advancements.

title: US to present 'take it or leave it' Israel-Gaza cease-fire deal amid escalating tensions
content: The Biden administration is preparing to deliver a final cease-fire and hostage-release proposal to Israel and Hamas after six dead hostages were found by Israeli forces. Coordinated with Egypt and Qatar, this plan may represent the last chance for a US-brokered resolution to the ongoing conflict, raising questions about Hamas's commitment.
summary: The Biden administration is preparing to deliver a final cease-fire and hostage-release proposal to Israel and Hamas after six dead hostages were found by Israeli forces. Coordinated with Egypt and Qatar, this plan may represent the last chance for a US-brokered resolution to the ongoing conflict, raising questions about Hamas's commitment.

title: Trump accuses 'Comrade' Kamala Harris of lying about McDonald's stint: 'She never worked there'
Namibia, facing drought, plans to kill elephants for meat
content: In response to a severe hunger crisis affecting nearly half its population amid the worst drought in a century, Namibia plans to cull 723 wild animals, including 83 elephants. The government sees this move as crucial for providing food and mitigating human-animal conflicts, leveraging natural resources efficiently for its citizens' benefit.
summary: In response to a severe hunger crisis affecting nearly half its population amid the worst drought in a century, Namibia plans to cull 723 wild animals, including 83 elephants. The government sees this move as crucial for providing food and mitigating human-animal conflicts, leveraging natural resources efficiently for its citizens' benefit.

title: California lawmakers pass landmark bills to atone for racism, but hold off on fund to take action
Billionaire donors driving 2024 US presidential campaigns: How Trump’s and Harris’ top backers are shaping election
content: The article examines the vital role of small and large donors in the presidential campaigns of Kamala Harris and Donald Trump. Highlighting substantial contributions from billionaires like Timothy Mellon and Elon Musk for Trump, and Reid Hoffman, George Soros for Harris, it underscores the significant influence wealthy donors have in modern political campaigns.
summary: The article examines the vital role of small and large donors in the presidential campaigns of Kamala Harris and Donald Trump. Highlighting substantial contributions from billionaires like Timothy Mellon and Elon Musk for Trump, and Reid Hoffman, George Soros for Harris, it underscores the significant influence wealthy donors have in modern political campaigns.

title: Nasa’s DART mission could trigger man-made meteor shower: What you need to know
content: Following NASA's DART mission that intentionally impacted asteroid moonlet Dimorphos, over two million pounds of space debris were generated. This debris could result in a faint, man-made meteor shower potentially visible on Earth and Mars over the next 10 to 30 years. The event underscores the importance of studying space debris and planetary defense.
summary: Following NASA's DART mission that intentionally impacted asteroid moonlet Dimorphos, over two million pounds of space debris were generated. This debris could result in a faint, man-made meteor shower potentially visible on Earth and Mars over the next 10 to 30 years. The event underscores the importance of studying space debris and planetary defense.

title: Russia launches missile attack on Kyiv, Ukraine says
content: Ukraine's air defense is actively countering a Russian missile attack on Kyiv. Concurrently, Ukraine's drone assault targeted Russian power plants and an oil refinery. In Kharkiv, missile strikes injured 47 people. President Zelenskyy called for global intervention, emphasizing enough courage and resources for Ukraine to defend itself against increasing Russian aggression.
summary: Ukraine's air defense is actively countering a Russian missile attack on Kyiv. Concurrently, Ukraine's drone assault targeted Russian power plants and an oil refinery. In Kharkiv, missile strikes injured 47 people. President Zelenskyy called for global intervention, emphasizing enough courage and resources for Ukraine to defend itself against increasing Russian aggression.

title: Is Melania secretly rooting for Kamala Harris? Former Trump aide drops a bombshell: 'She hates ...'
content: Anthony Scaramucci, former White House communications director, claims Melania Trump might support Kamala Harris more than he does due to her strong dislike for Donald Trump. Scaramucci humorously notes her intense aversion affects her political choices. Meanwhile, Melania remains out of the spotlight, focusing on her memoir, Melania, set for release on October 1, and her family.
summary: Anthony Scaramucci, former White House communications director, claims Melania Trump might support Kamala Harris more than he does due to her strong dislike for Donald Trump. title: Bangladesh HC rejects plea for ban on Awami League
US elections 2024: Muslim-American vote in focus as 'Abandon Harris' campaign intensifies
content: The 'Abandon Harris' campaign is intensifying efforts to sway Muslim-American voters against Vice President Kamala Harris in swing states, criticizing her stance on Gaza. Initially aimed at President Biden, the campaign shifted focus to Harris after Biden's exit, urging voters to consider alternatives.
summary: The 'Abandon Harris' campaign is intensifying efforts to sway Muslim-American voters against Vice President Kamala Harris in swing states, criticizing her stance on Gaza. Initially aimed at President Biden, the campaign shifted focus to Harris after Biden's exit, urging voters to consider alternatives.

title: US elections 2024: Harris edges out Trump - New polls show vice president leading in key battlegrounds
content: The 2024 presidential race is highly competitive, with Vice President Kamala Harris narrowly ahead of Donald Trump. Recent polls by ABC News/Ipsos show Harris leading, particularly among women and in key battleground states. Both candidates are ramping up their campaigns as Election Day draws near, aiming to secure their respective bases.
summary: The 2024 presidential race is highly competitive, with Vice President Kamala Harris narrowly ahead of Donald Trump. Recent polls by ABC News/Ipsos show Harris leading, particularly among women and in key battleground states. Both candidates are ramping up their campaigns as Election Day draws near, aiming to secure their respective bases.

title: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's heated argument: Duke snaps at wife, 'Why’s she having a go at me?'
content: Prince Harry, in his memoir Spare, shares a raw account of a heated argument with Meghan Markle, triggered by his deeper emotional issues. Emphasizing the importance of therapy and personal growth, he acknowledges Meghan's support in helping him confront his struggles, illustrating the real-life challenges in their relationship.
summary: Prince Harry, in his memoir Spare, shares a raw account of a heated argument with Meghan Markle, triggered by his deeper emotional issues.
